vulnerable.commit_message:
i2c-ddc: fix oob read

Suggested-by: Michael Hanselmann <public@hansmi.ch>
Signed-off-by: Gerd Hoffmann <kraxel@redhat.com>
Reviewed-by: Michael Hanselmann <public@hansmi.ch>
Reviewed-by: Philippe Mathieu-Daudé <philmd@redhat.com>
Message-id: 20190108102301.1957-1-kraxel@redhat.com
vulnerable.cve_desc: QEMU, through version 2.10 and through version 3.1.0, is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds read of up to 128 bytes in the hw/i2c/i2c-ddc.c:i2c_ddc() function. A local attacker with permission to execute i2c commands could exploit this to read stack memory of the qemu process on the host.
